name: Saumyaa
greetingText: This is Piyush Sharma Today is your birthday here's your surprise <3
textInChatBox: Happy birthday Saumyaa!! Wish you many many happy returns of the day..blah blah
text2: That's what I was about to do.
text4: I should make something from my own, that you might
outroText: Dear Saumyaa, Wishing you a very Happy Birthday! May your day be filled with warmth, laughter, and everything that brings you happiness. You’ve always been someone with a kind heart and a thoughtful soul, and I genuinely hope the year ahead rewards you with success, good health, and moments you'll cherish. Here's to new beginnings, continued growth, and all the wonderful things life has to offer. Have a fantastic birthday and a year as amazing as you are!
wishText: To the most beautiful and kind-hearted girl I could ever ask for – wishing you a very Happy Birthday! You truly look stunning today, and your presence lights up everything around you. Just wanted to say... Have a good day
replayText: And this is my own coded website just for you,I hope you liked it and keep this forever with you, With all love~ Your Piyush❤️
